about_the_game:
Tales of the Forgotten is a first-person walking simulator horror game with PSX-style graphics. Experience a collection of three short stories about ghosts that haunt everyday locations. Jump scares and creepy moments lurk around every corner. Complete all 3 stories to unlock more endings for each story. Unlock all endings to learn the secret of the forgotten ghosts.

The total playthrough time is 45-60 minutes.

Story 1: Mirror, Mirror


You’ve just purchased your first house, and you can’t wait to settle in. Unfortunately, an unwelcome presence is turning your dream home into a nightmare.

Story 2: Laundry Night


It’s late at night and you’re washing your clothes in a laundromat alone. Or at least, you think you’re alone, until you suddenly become aware of a ghost who is asking for your help.

Story 3: To Be Announced

Details of the third story will be announced soon!

Multiple Endings

Complete all three stories to unlock more endings for each story. Unlock all endings to learn the secret of the forgotten ghosts.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains jump scares and frightening moments.
